website_summaries.verdict: This hutch is a good value for the money providing a lot of space for your small rabbit.
pros: Can open from both the top and the side for easy access to your animals
Comes with a usable hay rack
Lots of room in this cage for toys
Good quality and functionality for the price
cons: The ramp is a little slippery for some animals and they may not want to use it

customer_reviews.title: Easy Assembly, Easy Accessibility to Inside,
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Jumbo Habitat as the new home for my son's new guinea pigs. Being a first time piggy owner, I figured going bigger would be a better bet then a starter cage. I have zero experience in animal cages but I have to say, I was and am not disappointed by this cage. Had it assembled in about 10 minutes while following the simple directions. The balcony is the perfect place for food and under is the perfect hiding space for the piggies. I also like the deep plastic base. I don't think the piggies will be throwing out the bedding at all which is nice. They have taken to the cage very well. So far we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Very large cage! Size of a coffee table
customer_reviews.text: The jumbo cage is huge! I got it for my little dwarf rabbit since I felt as though he needed more space. Boy did he get it! Very spacious cage of high quality. A little annoying to put together, but that is no different than any other wired pet cage. My bun bun loves his new palace. I am impressed with Amazon Basics.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: This cage is GREAT! I'm using it for my Robo Dwarf, so I had to mesh the entire thing since the bars are too far apart for any hamster. The size is way above the minimum requirements for hamsters so I love that. I don't use the hay holder, ladder, or second story area that came with it, but I have used the bowl for his sand bath. This cage is bigger than many suggested cages for hamsters, at about half the price. I suggest it for anyone willing to put the time in to mesh it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie

customer_reviews.title: My little 4lb lionhead rabbit loves his new cage. ...
customer_reviews.text: My little 4lb lionhead rabbit loves his new cage. He only spends nights in it, but it has lots of room.
customer_reviews.author: lefilledepluis

customer_reviews.title: Enough room for my 2 pigs!
customer_reviews.text: Was crossing my fingers I didn’t end up with any broken pieces like some reviews state and happy to announce everything was intact and great! Not sure why some people complain the plastic is low quality, I find it to be the opposite and especially for the price! Compared to my $100 big box version this is AMAZING! The Petsmart cage I had was ruined in about a week and so I had to find something better, this is it! Also, it’s bigger than you think once it’s all put together, but no complaints from me or my pigs!
customer_reviews.author: Citten

customer_reviews.title: Great cage for my bunny
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Super simple to assemble. Large cage for my 4lb bunny, gives him plenty of space to run around. The latches for the door at the top and the side is easy to open and close. I was looking for a good quality large cage for my other bunny and I was going to get one that is more expensive cause I wanted to make sure I got good quality but I read the reviews on this one and decided to give it a try cause it is less expensive than the other one and I am glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR TEDDY BEAR HAMSTERS OR HAMSTERS PERIOD!!!
customer_reviews.text: DEAR AMAZON IM SO DISAPPOINTED, THIS CAGE IS NOT FOR HAMSTERS BUT FOR SMALL ANIMALS?!!! I EXPECTED A MORE BETTER OF A DESCRIPTION FROM YOU GUYS AS THIS WAS ONE OF THE WORSE EXPERIENCES. MY HAMSTER ESCAPED 6 TIMES IN THE SAME DAY AND DO YOU SEE THE MEASURES I HAD TO TAKE! IM MORE DISAPPOINTED BECAUSE THIS CAGE IS GREAT QUALITY AND WOULD'VE BEEN MORE THAN ENOUGH SPACE FOR MY TEDDY BEAR HAMSTER BUT IT DIDN'T WORKOUT, AND THE ITEAM DESCRIPTION WASN'T HELPFUL AT ALL AND THE DOOR BROKE OFF LIKE REALLY AMAZON. Update!!! My teddy bear hamster is gone for good he escaped and never came back!!
customer_reviews.author: JAZZKING

customer_reviews.title: Great cage for large rabbit
customer_reviews.text: I would love to give this 5 stars, but I can't. It was tough to put together and one of the screws was missing to hold up the green stand. Our rabbit loves it, he is a larger breed and has plenty of room to run around. I also really like the two doors that open, it makes it easy to feed him and get him out of his cage.
customer_reviews.author: Trista

customer_reviews.title: Simple assembly, perfect size, great price, easy to clean and access.  Best I've ever seen.
customer_reviews.text: This cage is not only the perfect size for one or two guinea pigs (it meets the sq.ft. criteria for how much space each needs), but it's incredibly simple to put together, the top and side openings are huge, which allow my son to easily reach inside to fetch his buddy or feed him snacks, and the bottom tray is simple to unclip and dump out so there is no scooping. It only took 5 mins to put together and requires no tools. The price is great, too. I've seen far worse cages for double the price at brand name pet stores. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: D. C Smith

customer_reviews.title: Literally the best cage!!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought the Large sized cage and our guinea pig loves it!!!! Hes been making happy noises ever since got in it. Hes very active and loves to run circles so this cage is perfect of him! One of the clips was broken off the hay feeder, but the cage is still a superior product and would absolutely recommend it for anyone needing a small animal cage!
customer_reviews.author: JustAnotherMom

customer_reviews.title: Good construction, easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cage as a replacement cage for one of my rats who was being bullied in the group cage. It works very well for this purpose. It's a nice size for a rat and fits plenty of toys and accessories. The wire is sturdy. It was very easy to put together. I had some concerns about how it attaches the wire to the base not holding up to transport, but it's done just fine. The water bottle does not leak. The doors work well. All in all, I could not be more satisfied with this cage. I'm considering getting the jumbo size for my rabbit.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: This cage is amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This cage is amazing!!! Our rabbit loves it. Well constructed yet light weight. I did not pay attention to dimensions when I purchased. A little shocked at the size but we made room for it and the rabbit is grateful.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I have been pricing these small animal habitats for months and the larger ones were always a bit pricey. I came across this and thought there had to be something wrong with this cage for it to be so inexpensive. I read the reviews and decided to give it a try. This habitat is truly a great value for the money. What I paid for this, I paid for my small habitat. My little guinea pig loves his new home and space to run! I’m so glad I found this. Samantha
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Cage review
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cage for my holland lop rabbit. It’s a good size & I like all the accessories it comes with. I donated the water bottle. The only issues I have is the ramp/stair case is to long & takes up space (if you’re using it to house rabbits). The platform yes it’s secure w/ the “screws” provided, but I don’t like how it’s already somewhat dipping in the middle b/c no weight isn’t secured by the “screws.” I recommend this to animal owners whose pets are less than 3-4lbs & can access the platform w/o the Long staircase/ramp.
customer_reviews.author: amber quinata

customer_reviews.title: Size not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the large, advertised 42x24. After using it a few weeks with paper litter, I measured it for fleece liners. The floor is 35 1/2 x 16 1/2. At the largest points, it measures 40x21. I would return it but have already thrown out the box.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Great cage! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great cage for our guinea pigs! Has a lot of space for them and They love that they can hide under the balcony like it’s a cave! The balcony being connect to the cage saves so much room! Food bowl is the perfect size. Waters bottle is smaller than I preferred. The cage itself is very durable and I love that there is a side and top opening! And it was super easy to put together!! Overall perfect cage for a great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Tonja Ritchea

customer_reviews.title: Delivered damaged not good quality despite damage
customer_reviews.text: This cage is crap. Arrived with bent cage welds were detached easily as I tried to straighten. The platform bends not sturdy. It arrived bent in several places. The clasp that hold the base to cage are cheap don't trust. I currently own the living world deluxe pet habitat x-large and is the exact same size and way better quality. I.am returning and buying another living world deluxe pet habitat x-large. I bought this for a 5 pound rabbit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT the measurements as shown in product details
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this habitat specifically because, according to the measurements given by "the manufacturer," this was going to be 2" longer (48.6") and 2" wider (26") than the Midwest Guinea Pig Habitat Plus that my guinea pigs are currently occupying. With 2 male pigs, every inch counts! So I am beyond disappointed, and not a little angry, that this "Jumbo" AmazonBasics Small Animal Cage in reality measures 47" by 23 7/8" -- almost exactly the same as the Midwest habitat. Hey, Amazon -- you are misrepresenting information about something that's carrying your name. Some quality control, maybe? Or, at the very least, correct the information in the product listing.
customer_reviews.author: WinthropFan

customer_reviews.title: Guinea pig cage
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my guinea pig and I love it! I haven't put anything on the second level area yet because I am worried he can't climb up without falling. So every day I put a treat higher up in the steps so he can slowly get used to climbing up the ramp. It really is the strongest construction I have seen in any wire cage so far. Guinea pig seems to like it too
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: HUGE!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is HUGE! Way bigger than i expected, but will be a great cage to take when traveling to house our 2 dwarf bunnies together, with plenty room to spare for short time periods. Would be a great cage for a single bunny, who has time to run around outside the cage a few hours each day. We have a 3-story DIY condo and a pair of dwarf bunnies, son i woyod t have this as a permanent housing unit for them, but that’s just me. It is all high quality & came with everything it was supposed to have. Impressed.
customer_reviews.author: LacyJune

customer_reviews.title: Well built, easy cleaning, and  good for 1 older sedate Guinea pig
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly well built and sturdy. Great for one older Guinea pig, but not for smaller animals as the bars are wide and a rat or such would escape. So easy to clean as the top totally opens up. And a nice deep plastic bottom so bedding stays inside. I had a much bigger cage for him that I had a hard time dealing with, but now that he's old and sedate this is better. Otherwise, for an active younger Guinea pig I'd suggest a cage twice this length. I don't use the additions that came with it, just his old cubby he likes. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: CCC

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are incorrect
customer_reviews.text: This would be a great cage; however, the dimensions are off from the description. Even measured at the widest part of the cage (the top), there was a several-inch deficit between the actual product and the description. That's unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this cage for my guinea pigs. It is sturdy and easy to assemble. I did receive the item with a broken hay holder, but Amazon was quick to issue a partial refund so I can replace that part. They offered to do a return, but since I had already assembled the item, they offered another solution. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Horner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and roomy cage!
customer_reviews.text: We upgraded our old cage for our two guinea pigs. They absolutely love this! Has plenty of room to put their bed under the overhang, then leaves the other area open for them to run around. Guinea pigs need a ton of space to run, so we still take them out and put them in their runner every day, but this definitely gives them room for when they aren't in their runner. Solid construction, is not a hassle to clean like some cages. I love the dual opening tops and side, they make reaching in to put in snacks (or grab a piggy!) super easy. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: R. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Large smaller than in the description
customer_reviews.text: The Large unfortunately is smaller that the description says. The top of the base measures 40"x20", so it was a disappointment for me. The top doesn't correctly fit the base in one of the corners, and some of the bars were already bent. Overall, the cage is decent. I should have exchanged it because of the flaws, but there was no time for that, because I had to cover it with mesh for a hamster that was arriving in a few days. She likes it very much, so that's what counts.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy cage
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t as much of a space upgrade as I’d hoped but definitely sturdier just due to age than the old cage we had. So far the two lionhead rabbits I’ve got really enjoy it, it’ll take my toddler a little while longer to figure out how to open this cage, and the elevated piece is really convenient. Easy to put together, did need pliers because one piece had bent slightly during shipping and wouldn’t allow the bars to align. I’m not using the provided waterer because I’ve already got a bigger one so can’t say much on that. If the video loads please excuse the background noises, my toddler was trying to be helpful and climb on me.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Schaffer

customer_reviews.title: Good size for two guinea pigs.
customer_reviews.text: The first cage arrived with a seriously busted corner. Back it went. The second one had a corner that was also damaged in shipping, but still usable. The ramp is useless and unnecessary for piggies, so don't bother with it. The platform is big enough to put their bowl of fresh vegetables, water bowl (they don't like water bottles) and pellet bowl. Unfortunately, it is also big enough to make it nearly impossible to get reach those little rascals when I'm trying to catch them. Terrifying for them and stressful for me. Hopefully, that problem will work itself out as they begin to understand I am the food woman.
customer_reviews.author: LookingUp

customer_reviews.title: Excellent guinea pig home
customer_reviews.text: This is a truly nice cage and probably the bear minimum needed to keep a couple guinea pigs. It's easy to access them from the top or side, super easy to clean, esp. without the second level and ramp, which we don't use at this point since our guinea pigs are young and still try to evade us when we want to handle them. Cleaning the cage takes about 10 minutes because the top is easy to lift off and the bottom is light enough to lift with ease to dump debris. I would never want a canvas bottom cage. This seems so much more practical.
customer_reviews.author: Tara H.

customer_reviews.title: Very good value!
customer_reviews.text: I have a few different rabbit cages, including one that was 2x the cost, and this is the best value cage that I have found. It's easy to put together, seems very well made and has large and easy to use doors. I highly recommend this cage! It's about as big as you are going to get with this style cage, but remember that your rabbit should still have exercise out of the cage daily. I think this would be a good choice for a pair of guinea pigs, also.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: sides are too short to fit
customer_reviews.text: I feel rather silly because everyone said it was easy to assemble. The wire cage does not fit into the corner pieces and/or the edges. I am bending it to make it fit inside the notches. The balcony is not stable. The hay holder only attaches on one side, so i am using pipe cleaners to keep it stable. I wish I would have bought something else.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieB

customer_reviews.title: Great for little animals!
customer_reviews.text: The plastic bottom came with one of the corners cracked but that was probably UPS and some of the metal is bent but not bad enough not to use! My daughter got a dwarf hotot bunny for Easter and he loves this cage. He runs laps around it and there was enough space to add a little bed and litter box! He loves the ramp and the "food" platform as we call it. I don't feel bad when I have to leave him in it for a couple hours because it's plenty big & the price was half of anything else I had found for what you got!
customer_reviews.author: kcviper

customer_reviews.title: Great for my little hedgie
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my hedgehog. This one was less expensive than the other one I had picked out. It works great and was easy to assemble. I ended up removing the ramp and platform since I don’t really need it with a hedgehog. I have his food dishes, his 12” wheel, a corner fleece forest, and his big igloo in there and there is still plenty of floor space for him. This is my 1st hedgehog, so I was pretty clueless but I think I made a good choice. After cleaning the 1st time, I realized the front opening is an amazing feature.
customer_reviews.author: Dede Mills

customer_reviews.title: Not just for rodents :)
customer_reviews.text: My sons turtle has been living in an aquarium and I've been looking for an alternative. When I ran across this I saw potential and with the help of my hot glue gun have moved Roy (the turtle) into his forever home. This thing is big enough that he has plenty of roaming and exploring room. The openings on the front and top allow for easy access to his water dish and the enclosed area keeps the cats out. Super happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Big!!
customer_reviews.text: When I go on vacation I take my guinea pig to my grandmas house so she can watch her. I was looking for something that she wouldn’t be too cramped in for about a week. I’m an idiot so I thought none of these would be big enough and went for the biggest size. HUGE. It’s not as big as her cage at home but this is so much better than those tiny cages they sell at pet stores. If you’re looking to use this longtime I would recommend it, a lot of moving room although personally I always prefer bigger for my pets. Also very nice that you can open the cage from either the side or the top
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Its great!
customer_reviews.text: ITS SO MUCH BIGGER THAN I EXPECTED! I measured it out and everything so I should have known, but I was still scared it was going to be to small bc of how miniature it looks in the pictures. But I was surprised when it came, and my husband even thought the box was half styrofoam bc of how big it was. My ferret loves it and honestly so do I. She has a great amount of space for how little I payed, and the top level gives it even more space. The only negative is that the ramp came broken, so I had to throw it out since it was unuseable.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie s.

customer_reviews.title: MISLEADING ADVERTISING
customer_reviews.text: IS NOT POSSIBLE THAT I JUST CAN'T GET A REFUND, I HAVE RECEIVED A CAGE WITHOUT ALL FIXING PARTS OF THE CAGE AND THE BALCONY, ALONG WITH FOOD PLATE... I HAVE SPENT 74 USD FOR THIS, TO HAVE NOW AN USELESS CAGE, AND BESIDES THAT THERE'S NO AN EASY WAY TO MAKE A COMPLAIN HERE.... I THINK I'VE LOST WITH MY MONEY WITH AMAZON!!! TOTALLY........ I'M SO UPSET RIGHT NOW....
customer_reviews.author: Maria Luvecce

customer_reviews.title: Nice cage for pets
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my hedgehog. It's a nice BIG cage with shelf and ramp. I ended up adding some plexiglass to keep the hedgie from falling off the shelf and ramp. The really great part of the cage is the two doors - one on top and a big double door on front. Really easy to reach in for cleaning, feeding etc. Would be perfect for guinea pigs too.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hilt

customer_reviews.title: I tried two of these cages and both of them were defective
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this cage a few days ago and everything about it is fine other than the fact that the wire frame does not fit into the plastic base. (If you manage to get a cage that isn't defective, you will probably love it.) The wire frame top isn't big enough to fit into the grooves made for it in the plastic bottom half and it is the same way with both cages. I know another reviewer had this problem, but since most people left good reviews, I figured I'd end up with a working cage. Not the case.
customer_reviews.author: Happymomma2020

customer_reviews.title: Great for small pets
customer_reviews.text: Brought this for a bunny that is growing. Enough space for it to roam around from Bottom of cage to “2nd floor”. End up not using the hay holder that attach to the side of the cage, too messy and some of the hay end up falling outside of the cage. Also didn’t use the food ball since it about the same size as the bunny I have. Great value and size for small pets like bunny or hamster.
customer_reviews.author: K.Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Best cage for the lowest Price
customer_reviews.text: I have six of these they are the best priced biggest guinea pig cage you can get, top and front doors work awesome and the cage just holds into place with a few clips onto the bottom plastic liner, comes with a water bottle and feeder, I kept the feeder but bought bigger easily refillable water bottles but the one it comes with is fine just little, needs to be filled every other day, but really easy to assemble and is very sturdy overall a great cage.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Cage
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these cages. When you actually measure it, it is not big enough for a guinea pig. I have kept guinea pigs in this cage, however, I didn't really like it. I keep the cages for temporary housing for if I bring in a new guinea pig or if one needs separated. I would not keep a hamster in this cage, as the bar spacing is not good. If you want to keep your hamster in this, you need to DIY it to keep the hamster from escaping. Overall, it's an ok cage, just not for permanent housing for your guinea pig.
customer_reviews.author: Doris

customer_reviews.title: Mislead by amazon representative
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of this cage where the Piggy's are is only 43" long if messured it twice it is easy to clean but is not as long as it says in called amazon an the rep that answered the phone said this cage was the biggest witch is a lie , I allso purchased to fleece beddings at 54.00 each for the cage an the fleece bedding is 4to 5 inch's to long for the cage, I'm so disapointed , I think the rep was just trying to put a plug in for Amazon's cage , so I'm ordering the living word xl cage I had one before an it's Hugh way longer then this one
customer_reviews.author: charlene fraleigh

customer_reviews.title: Good cage
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. I use this for my small 4lb. bunny, when we're not home (otherwise he's out - you would want a bigger cage if he's not coming out often). The ramp and second level aren't super sturdy. Our bunny does fine with the second level, but I wouldn't trust it with a larger bunny or other pet that is larger than 5lbs. The ramp takes up a lot of floor space in the cage, so keep that in mind if you end up leaving it in there (we didn't). The top and side openings are helpful. Also, a 14x12x7" litter box will easily fit in this cage.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Who knew Amazon sold products like this?! After searching through several pet stores, I couldn't find a cage big enough for my newly acquired rabbit. Praise Amazon because this is PERFECT. Easy to assemble. Easy to get in/out of (the rabbit, not me) and I love that the top of the cage opens as big as it does. It makes cleaning a breeze. It's also lightweight enough for my weak arms to move. Definitely worth the price which in itself isn't bad!
customer_reviews.author: ConStarTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, good quality, but would've gone for the bigger size
customer_reviews.text: It's a good product. I wish the level was a bit higher since my guinea pig seems squished, and there isn't much room for him to roam. This would be more suitable for a young pig. But overall, it's easy to clean and good, sturdy material, so it works.
customer_reviews.author: CDowns

customer_reviews.title: Ed, my rabbit likes it and so do i
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to assemble. Heavier than I expected. My rabbit likes laying on the platform. You need to be sure the animal can get on it and under it easily . I didn’t use the ramp. It takes up a lot of floor space so if using for a rabbit, the rabbit can’t hop around. My rabbit can easily jump on the platform. To clean you need to take the platform out to get I under it. It’s not hard just another step to clean . The hay bin is super small so I don’t use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.text: I have two bunnies. I bought a cage for one bunny at a ranch store. It was very basic and I felt it was overpriced but I needed it immediately. When I decided to get a new cage for my other bunny I had time to shop around. When I found this one, which is the same size, has better latches, a little loft, and food accessories for considerably less, I decided to give it a shot. Set up was easy. It seems to be made better than more expensive basic one. It is super easy to access to clean it. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for brooding chicks
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these to use as a chick brooder. This summer, I had just finished washing the brooder and put it in the sun to dry when a huge tree fell on it. So I bought another. I love putting the brooder light on the wire, that way there is no way the light can slip and burn the whole chicken house down.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H.

customer_reviews.title: Holland lop loves the jumbo
customer_reviews.text: The one I ordered came with a broken plastic bin (included picture) but returning and getting a replacement was so simple and no cost to me. Originally was going to be redelivered on a Thursday but arrived early on Tuesday! The cage was super simple to put together and is sturdy. My holland lop really enjoys the jumbo, it has so much space for him to feel comfortable. At first we used bedding but it got everywhere so I figured out that a toddler size mattress protector fits wonderfully, it’s cozy for him and waterproof. This really is a great cage for the price, I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: kevin bishop

customer_reviews.title: Decent cage
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent cage. It can be a little tricky putting in the second layer. It sometimes wobbles and sometimes it's crooked, then you have to redo it. A little frustrating. Other than that and the fact that the hay holder came with broken tabs, I like this cage. We use security ties to keep the hay holder on. I love how wide the doors open in the front and on top. Good quality metal. Sturdy cage, easy to clean. My guinea pig loves running around the ramp in circles. It's easy for her to climb up to the second level as well.
customer_reviews.author: Missi

customer_reviews.title: Great habitat
customer_reviews.text: As an active rabbit rescuer who believes in indoor housing only I rely on 48" cages for baby rabbits and unaltered bunnies. Cages are only for temporary housing BUT this habitat is every bit as big as its competitors and less than half the price. The quality is great and 2 baby rabbits are having a great time in it already. Top opening is large and easy to change litter pans.
customer_reviews.author: K. Brown

customer_reviews.title: and I am really happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I just got this cage today, and I am really happy with it. Nothing was broken or missing. The wire is a nice thick gauge and the doors feel sturdy and close securely. It was east to setup, maybe 10min total with adding in the accessories. We are using it for a small bunny and I think it will work well.
customer_reviews.author: skingsbury

customer_reviews.title: Best cage you will find!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am seriously pleased with this cage. I’ve bought many cages over the years and this cage is by far the best value, it’s well made, and comes with a lot. My guinea pigs LOVE this cage. The cage is HUGE!!!! It’s the size of a large coffee table (I’ve attached a pic). The best part is the nice deep pan for the shavings. I haven’t had any problems with shavings flying out onto the floor with this. I can’t believe they aren’t charging more for this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations! Well worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow I was definitely not expecting a huge cage! I was expecting a smaller size! Definitely exceeded my expectations! I just wanted something small and simple and well equipped with what I needed for the bunny essentials, that's why I had ordered this cage. Well worth it. If you order it, you definitely won't be disappointed! What you pay it what you get and definitely got the bang for my buck!
customer_reviews.author: janet

customer_reviews.title: Great for my Guinea Pig
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my guinea pig four months ago. It is absolutely perfect. It is the perfect size for her to have room to run around with room for her litter box, a tunnel, bed, two food bowls, water bottle, and hay rack plus toys. I got it in the largest size. The floor is smooth and non-grid, so it doesn't hurt her feet, it is easy to take apart to clean, and it is super easy to use whatever bedding you'd like. I use a layer of equine pellets under a layer of fleece and it is perfect. My guinea pig is so happy, as am I!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Large, sturdy, good value
customer_reviews.text: This cage is larger than any I could find in the stores. It's sturdy, has a nice large door in the front, and less expensive than any other large cage. It's secure in keeping my guineas safe from my cats. My four guinea pigs are happy in their new home.
customer_reviews.author: B. Price

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and great quality
customer_reviews.text: This product came in great packaging and was very easy to assemble with an easy to read manual. The quality of the plastic is sturdy and dependable. The bottom is so deep and easy to clean. My guinea pig loves it but is scared to go up the stairs as of now. We are just going to remove that feature, since the cage can be customized. It comes with the bowl you see in the picture, a water bottle, and a hay feeder. It was definitely worth the price and it seems like it will last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Nisha Sumasar

customer_reviews.title: Very fragile, came damaged.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our rabbit, we were really excited to find something so nice for the price. But upon receiving the item, in an undamaged box, the corner was cracked all the way down and the hay feeder was missing one of the hooks used to hold it onto the wire. The only way to get anything done would be to send it back, but we would have to pay for the return shipping. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kona Productions

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were only in chinese and the balcony was loose on one side, so when the bunny stepped on it, it rattled. Low quality and lack of instructions in english make me give this cage 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra H

customer_reviews.title: The top pushes inward when locked
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice large cage but my cat fell thru the top. I will attach a video showing how when I put weight on the one side, the part of the gate bows and goes inward enough for him to fit thru even tho it is locked. And he is a 13 pound cat. Lol. I like the cage overall but not very safe if you have cats or other animals that could possibly get into the cage.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: The 2 boy pigs LOVE it! Just measure because even the large is ...
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the large because the jumbo is a few inches to long for our space. The 2 boy pigs LOVE it! Just measure because even the large is huge but at least this is their forever cage amd it was worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Angela R Williams

customer_reviews.title: Nice cage, and size
customer_reviews.text: a little heavy for me, top is metal, and I'm not sure how to put it all together.Bought for for baby ducks,not guinea pigs so don't use the ramp etc., nice over head room as ducks grow fast.Could have gone a little larger,but it's just a temp cage for now.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Wish a would have gotten the size bigger as it’s for my rabbit. It’s definitely roomie enough for him but I had to take the stairs off for him to have more room, he still gets up on the platform. I love that it has two doors, front and top. The only down fall in my eyes is that the cage part sometimes comes loose from the plastic, luckily our rabbit is pretty well behaved but it makes it tricky when moving it!
customer_reviews.author: Oregon customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product just not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I personally think I misunderstood the measurements. I was buying this for my Syrian hamster so she could have more room to run around. Space wise it was too large for a Syrian hamster and the bars were too wide. I have a rabbit that I believe would have loved this cage. Definitely better suited for "larger" small animal pets.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great big cage for 2 guinea pigs
customer_reviews.text: After getting a second guinea pig, we needed a bigger cage. This cage is perfect. It is very large and offers space for them to move around. Also, love the big upper area where they can go to get snacks. My only complaint is that it is tricky to clean. We use bedding with the guinea pigs, and it takes three of us to get this dumped into a trash bag without making a mess.
customer_reviews.author: leslock

customer_reviews.title: Great size for hedgehog.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cage for my sister's hedgehog. Great size and construction.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cheno

customer_reviews.title: So happily surprised with this Amazon cage.
customer_reviews.text: The box was enormous because this great cage was twice the size of what I thought I was getting. It’s perfect for two pigs with their huts, a tube and the bowl that came with it. Nice and sturdy with top and side openings. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Renteria

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy one of those soft bottom cages. Bite the bullet and buy this. Its 20x easier to clean and the same size. Cleaning the soft bottom cages was a 2 person job to not make a mess. This cage is 1 person job to clean and takes 1/4 of the time. You'll find yourself changing out the bedding more because of how much easier it is to maintain.
customer_reviews.author: thomas wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Description size is not actual size!
customer_reviews.text: For the standard size it is 31.7 by 21.8. The Box itself that it came in is only 30 by 19! The cage is a full 1/2 inch smaller each way around! Doesn't sound like much but when you're a guinea pig you need those couple extra inches. The only reason I bought this cage, was because of the size! I could have saved myself $15 and gotten a smaller cage that is the same size as this one is now.
customer_reviews.author: Tinylynx

customer_reviews.title: Really nice cage, but your animal may hesitate using 2nd tier
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the quality of the cage. We purchased for two larger guinea pigs. They won’t climb the steps, which would probably be ok under their weight but it does flex quite a bit which I believe is why they won’t do any more than lean on it. Besides the shelf and stairs, which don’t appear like they’ll be used by us, the cage is very nice
customer_reviews.author: thisguy

customer_reviews.title: Big and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great cage for my daughter's 2 guineas. It looks nice, it's sturdy, and and there is lot of space for the guinea pigs to run around. My daughter has often said how happy she is with it.
customer_reviews.author: Natty D

customer_reviews.title: Great for large rabbit!
customer_reviews.text: This cage works well for our rabbit. It gives it enough room to move around and he seems to love the shelf that he can sit up on or crawl underneath. Would highly recommend this cage. Very sturdy construction, yet it is light enough to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Smythers

customer_reviews.title: Great for a first house for day old chicks.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT. I use this for baby chicks. Its a perfect first home for first chicks. I dont use the green tray until they are about 2 weeks old. And the ladder is not needed. I dont need the food trays either or the waterer for the chicks. THis is plenty big enough for bantam chicks and young chicks when starting out. Keeps the heat lamp at a good height too. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisasuniquegiftsnmore

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: Being an animal rescuer, I have long been in search of a "jumbo" critter habitat that wouldn't break the bank, jackpot!! It's even bigger than I had expected, and came with lots of extras!! The "upstairs" shelf is great for the food dish (included) to prevent tipping! The high plastic bottom keeps the litter/bedding inside, where it belongs, and the hay chute keeps the Timothy hay out of the litter!!! And all for about half what you'd pay at a pet store!!! Very pleased with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: muttmama71

customer_reviews.title: Large size
customer_reviews.text: I like that already our baby guinea pig is popping all over, and you can tell she is happy, she figured out how to go up and down the ramp quickly. The adult Peruvian, just liked hanging out on the upper deck. I tried to guide her how to get down and she seemed fine. dont know if she will go back up again. I do like the size for both my piggies, you can tell they are happy. Not too hard to assemble, . In general, so far, I like this cage. seems sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Roomy , well priced small animal habitat
customer_reviews.text: Like the cage/habitat it's nice a roomy , has two doors one up top and one on the side and the rabbit that was given to me he gives it two paws up ! And the price was more reasonable than Petco or Pet Smart
customer_reviews.author: Colette

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Not as big as they state on description. The measurements are said to be 31.7" in length, it just makes it to 30". The width is stated to be 22", it just comes to 18". The only measurement that was correct was the height, and that's the least of my concerns for a baby guinea pig that's going to need space to grow before being introduced to the big girl cage after her quarantine period is done. I don't know what the actual measurements are for the bigger sizes of cages offered, but for this size I could have gotten almost the same measurements, same build and sturdiness for about $15 cheaper with another brand, even right here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: M. Brymesser

customer_reviews.title: The cage itself is GREAT! However
customer_reviews.text: The cage itself is GREAT! However, the ramp is too slippery for the bunny to safely go up and down. We had to remove the shelf for fear of her getting hurt jumping up and down. So, without the second story, it eliminates a place for her to "hide" or feel secure. Hoping we can figure out how to help the ladder to be able to keep the second story. Any suggestions welcome!
customer_reviews.author: J and D Hadley

customer_reviews.title: like this one
customer_reviews.text: I needed a habitat that had a plastic base, like this one, to keep the bedding from falling out onto the table and floor! But I especially like the shelf. My hedgehog needed some more space to play! I had a little trouble hooking his water trough to the bars because of the spacing of the wires. (Hedgehogs don't seem to like drinking water from a dropper.) This cage is easy to clean with to openings on the side and top.
customer_reviews.author: Chronic Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. So perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I love this habitat!! It took digging to find it for some reason. When i did a search on Amazon it didn't pop up for days!!? This product is perfect, affordable, I could assemble it alone and works perfectly with "Guineadad" fleece.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cage!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our dwarf rabbit. She seems to like it. It wasn't too difficult to put together according to my husband. I would recommend this cage. I like that it opens from the top and the front. Its fairly easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great Habitat for Guinea Pig!
customer_reviews.text: My little guinea LOVES his new habitat! Very large and plenty of room for him to run and play. The platform and ramp was easy for him to learn access. He uses ramp to get up, but sometimes he'll just jump off when he's done. I keep his food and salad bowls and water bottle up on platform and he loves it! I highly recommend this habitat!
customer_reviews.author: michael young

customer_reviews.title: Easy assemble
customer_reviews.text: Best cage I’ve ever had. Bought it for my daughters adult rat. I was concerned that the wires might be too far apart but they are not. It’s perfect. Very roomy. Larger than expected. Great price. Very easy to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew and Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Bunny Cage
customer_reviews.text: This cage is a good size. I use the opening on the top the most but it also has the one on the side. Bun goes up and down the "slide" and likes to sit on the shelf and stare at us..probably judging us a little. The cage works great but I am pretty sure she is plotting her escape. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy hard plastic bottom cage, not really big enough for two
customer_reviews.text: Good for one guinea pig, pushing it with two, out of the question for three. It’s probably not really big enough for two unless they happen to be on the small side. But it is easy to put together and to clean. You will need a much bigger water bottle than the one it comes with if you have two guinea pigs.
customer_reviews.author: MDB

customer_reviews.title: Decent But Not Great for Rats
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about a year. As a first time rat owner I didn't realize the bar spacing was too wide for female rats. I was forced to cover the entire cage with landscape fabric which was not only a hassle but also hindered accessibility/movement of the doors, in turn making maintenance and cleaning more difficult. About a month ago my rats learned they could chew through the plastic base - after patching 2 holes it soon became a daily problem. Eventually ordered a Critter Nation. Pros: Spacious enough for 2 (up to 4?) rats Decent build quality and design Affordable Cons: Wide bar spacing and thin plastic Limited verticality
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my headgehog!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cage for my hedgehog, and it's a perfect size for him! The solid bottom prevents his tiny, skinny legs from injury, and the wire top is sturdy enough to keep the cat out! At first, I was worried if placing the heat lamp directly on top of the cage could warp or damage it but so far there's no worry for that happening! The accessories that came with the cage were mostly for rabbits and guinea pigs... btw, please do not use this cage for their permanent home, it is way too small for them! I am so glad that I purchased this product.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Kiuchi

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning, animal space, and function! Definitely reccomend.
customer_reviews.text: This cage has been so great! We previously had a very large rabbit hutch we thought would be great due to the room to roam, but since it was made of wood, it was incredibly difficult to get and keep clean. This cage, being made of plastic, is so much easier to clean, there aren't a ton of parts to work around, the size is great for our two piggies, and it comes with a quality water bottle, bowl, and grass feeder. I have zero complaints. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Eli & Paula

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this!! I bought it for my two piggies as the cage I had was too small for them. I wanted something they could run around in and not be bumping in to each other. It is plenty big and easier to clean than I thought it would be. They won't use the upper deck but I keep hoping they will. It was a great buy at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: You can get to medium size or 3 small guinea pigs comfortably into this cage
customer_reviews.text: Package 12 delivered on time excellent cage very well made works well for two maybe three hamsters if they are not large in size and that they all get along. Would recommend used to this for anyone. Cages easy to clean and the guinea pigs seem to like them very well.
customer_reviews.author: pic 3

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy
customer_reviews.text: It’s a decent cafe for the price. We went with a standard size for our guinea pig. The ramp seems to take up a lot of room. If she decides not to use it, we will take it out. It’s incredibly easy to put together & very sturdy. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn carper

customer_reviews.title: Saddened
customer_reviews.text: This came in and I am very please with it. We like it so much we were going to purchase another one, but the price jumped from $34.99 to $54.99 and I refuse to pay $20 more for something I just purchased. I had it in my cart for over a week before I had enough money to purchase it the first time. No, it was not part of a BlackFriday deal either. The large one is $5 cheaper than the standard right now, but I can’t get that either because it is too big. I wish I could reorder the same product for the same price...
customer_reviews.author: Curious

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It’s fantastic! We got the xl cage and our bun loves it. I would suggest getting a different water bottle or bowl but the food bowl it comes with is nice and can’t be tipped over.
customer_reviews.author: M. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate measurements - too small
customer_reviews.text: I received this cage and took it out of the box. Immediately it seemed smaller than I expected. I got out my tape measure and found that it is shorter than the description by a couple inches and is more narrow as well. I also realized that the interior dimensions at the bottom are much smaller as well because the plastic bottom is tapered. Overall it seems like a decent starter cage, but I’m not sure how well it will hold up long term and it wasn’t as big as what I wanted for my hedgehog.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Portenier

customer_reviews.title: Good cage for 2 big guinea pigs!
customer_reviews.text: Huge cage and works perfectly for my two guinea pigs! Easy to clean with all the compartments that open up. The hay feeder had one broken hook but other than that, it is good. The water bottle could be a bit bigger for the jumbo size cage but I have other bottles so it works out. If you don't have any bottles, you may want to go and purchase a bigger one.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Kiley

customer_reviews.title: Jumbo really is Jumbo!
customer_reviews.text: They are not kidding when they say it’s “jumbo”. This is a really nice cage, lots of room! My guinea pig never used a ramp, so she was a bit afraid. The ramp is a little slippery, I covered it with some fleece and now it is fine. You could use some non-slip tape I’m sure. The loft is very spacious too!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle S.

customer_reviews.title: Great guinea pig and rabbit cage
customer_reviews.text: Great roomy cage for our 2 guinea pigs. The double doors also come in handy. We don’t use the shelf though, because our rabbit likes to visit them, and between the piggies, igloos and visiting lop/lion head bunny, there’s not enough room.
customer_reviews.author: Bill T

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal for the price. We ordered the jumbo for two guinea pigs we were getting our daughter for her birthday and we were shocked at the size. This thing is massive, much larger than I thought it would be, especially with the balcony. We ended up getting a third guinea pig just because we have the space and we couldn’t make up our minds at the breeders. My husband said putting it together was very easy, it only took him a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Hgully

customer_reviews.title: For a hedgehog
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cage. Very large. I love the opening at the top. It feels pretty sturdy, and it fits a 12 inch exercise wheel, two litter trays, an igloo, food dish and water bottle without overcrowding the cage. With all that, there’s still plenty of free space for a hedgehog to roam around.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good cage but the corner cleats disappear
customer_reviews.text: This is a good sized cage for the money. The big design flaw is that the corner cleats--the connecting point between the metal cage and the plastic bottom--are easy to lose in the process of cleaning the cage as you must disassemble the plastic from the metal part to do so. This renders the cage un-usable and there are no replacement parts for sale for this item
customer_reviews.author: Marion

product_meta.title: AmazonBasics Small Animal Cage Habitat With Accessories
feature_bullets: Large small-animal habitat for pet rabbits, guinea pigs, or chinchillas
Iron wire upper frame and PP plastic base; large top and front openings for easy inside access
Includes non-drip water bottle, hay guard, and balcony with access ramp and tip-proof food dish
Hide-away space underneath balcony for privacy; simple assembly (no tools needed)
Measures 42.1 by 24.2 by 19.7 inches (LxWxH); weighs 15.56 pounds; backed by an AmazonBasics limited 1-year warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
